pages.text: $(li)The Ogre, also know as the $(l)Strongest Goblin$(), is the $(l:patchouli:bosses/goblin_king)Goblin King's$(/l) most faithful servant.$(br)$(li)If it detects you, it will not hesitate to destroy you.$(br)$(li)This creature has a lot of life and not only that, he will inflicts you high physical damage as well.

$(li)As long as the Goblin King is alive, it will emit an intimidating screams that will intimate you, inflicting the $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/weakness)Weakness$(/l) effect on you.$(br)$(li)This effect reduces your physical damage dramatically.$(br)$(li)It may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/goblins_and_dungeons/ogre_tusk)Ogre Tusk$(/l) upon death.
